title: AU Small Finance Bank submits application to RBI for voluntary transition to universal bank
description: AU Small Finance Bank has applied to the Reserve Bank of India for voluntary transition to a universal bank. This change would ease regulatory norms, including lower capital adequacy requirements and reduced priority sector lending obligations. Only AU and Ujjivan Small Finance Bank meet the eligibility criteria set by RBI in April.
